creator: GameiCreate
descriptionHtml:
Give desperately needed makeovers and help people achieve their dreams with stunning transformations! Dive into a world of free Dream Match 3 puzzles and mini tile match3 puzzle games packed with exciting makeover challenges. Choose from a stylish selection of clothes, hairstyles, makeup, and decorations! Solve challenging Match3 puzzles to unlock amazing fashion items and earn coins for even more decorating fun & Play Tile Match 3 Fun Game! Embark on a captivating tile-matching adventure.

And BOOM! It is 100% no ad free offline puzzle games and no wifi needed - internet free.

7000+ Match3 Project Makeover Puzzle Levels for you

CHOOSE from a vast wardrobe of fashionable clothes and accessories to create the perfect look!

MAKEOVER clients in need, giving them the confidence to pursue their dreams and reach new heights!

DECORATE rooms and create stylish makeovers, personalizing every detail for each unique client!

SOLVE Tile Match - Match 3 Tiles puzzles mini game with fun challenges and exciting boosters to help you through every level!

BLAST through Dream Match3 puzzle levels with powerful boosters and amazing effects, unlocking new fun stories, help them with tile mini makeover game & earning coins along the way free games for girls

We have thousands of challenging match3 makeover levels for you to play in the Royal match3 Arena! JOIN the fun, explore Dream Fashion makeover team, and embark on an amazing adventure where each match3 level brings a new puzzle challenge and the chance to create fantastic dream makeovers!

Why You'll Love Tile Match - Match 3 Tiles Mini games :
- Addictive and Relaxing. Tile Match - Match 3 Tiles with candy match3 strikes the perfect balance between challenge and relaxation. It's a game you can play to unwind after a long day or engage in intense tile-matching sessions during your free time.
- Innovative Gameplay. Tile Match - Match 3 Tiles takes the classic match 3 puzzle concept to new heights. With innovative mechanics and clever twists, we offer a refreshing take on a beloved genre, providing an experience like no other.
- Brain-Boosting. Engage your brain with puzzles that require both skill and strategy. Tile Match - Match 3 project makeover is designed to sharpen your mind and keep you mentally agile.

Included Stories :
1) Wedding Betrayal Girl: Grace From San Diego, USA
Heartbroken by Luke's betrayal, Grace is shattered when he slams the door on her. She vows to become a stunning dream bride makeover and marry someone who will make Luke regret it.

2) Chef Girl: Stella From France
After tasting her spoiled food, the head chef fires Stella. Stella starts her venture, but it struggles and fails.

3) A Retired Army man: loses his family after returning from deployment, leaving him devastated. Overcome by grief, he faces job loss, financial ruin, and homelessness.

4) Rescue Fairy: Seraphina , From the Enchanted Forest
Jealous step-sister Morgana sabotages Seraphina. Seraphina's downfall prevents her royal marriage.

5) Halloween Story: Soraya From Eldermoor, Scotland
She watches in sorrow as her Halloween party area catches fire, ruining the event.
Sits on the ground in despair, calling it the worst party. Exhausted, she begins clearing the area alone, until the Project Makeover team arrives to help.

Play free Match-3 puzzles, decorate fabulous rooms, and dive into the world of fashion and makeovers in this fun and exciting puzzle game for all players!

Download now and start swapping for endless fun.

Need help? Visit our support page in the Dream Mania Match3 app or email us at gameicreate@gmail.com.
descriptionShort: Match3 Puzzle Game with Different stories, Makeover, Decoration & Tile Match fun
